description: Oil prices rose slightly in early Asian trade on Friday as nations seek to address global crude oil and fuel supply tightness.
title: Oil prices rise on tight supply, inventory uncertainty - Reuters.com
content:
June 24 (Reuters) - Oil prices rose slightly in early Asian trade on Friday as nations seek to address global crude oil and fuel supply tightness.

description: Members of the Lederne labour union representing Norwegian oil workers have voted against a wage deal negotiated with oil companies, a state-appointed mediator said on Thursday.
title: Norway oil workers at one union reject wage deal - Reuters.com

description: Libyan oil total production is at about 700,000 barrels per day (bpd), the Libyan oil minister Mohamed Oun told Reuters on Monday.
title: Libya oil output rises to about 700000 bpd, minister says - Reuters.com
content:
BENGHAZI, June 20 (Reuters) - Libyan oil total production is at about 700,000 barrels per day (bpd), the Libyan oil minister Mohamed Oun told Reuters on Monday.

description: Saudi Arabia, the world's top oil exporter, raised August crude oil prices for Asian buyers to near record levels amid tight supply and robust demand.
title: Saudi Arabia sets Aug crude prices to Asia at near-record high - sources - Reuters.com
content:
SINGAPORE, July 5 (Reuters) - Saudi Arabia, the world's top oil exporter, raised August crude oil prices for Asian buyers to near record levels amid tight supply and robust demand.

author: Nadeen Ebrahim, CNN
description: When oil exporters meet on Tuesday to decide on whether to raise output, they'll have to take into account a looming global recession that threatens to slash demand for their crude and diminish their ability to control its price.
title: Why OPEC may not have the answer to high oil prices
